title: Look up for a change
description: How often do you see the true beauty of the night sky? TED Fellow Lucianne Walkowicz shows how light pollution is ruining the extraordinary -- and often ignored -- experience of seeing directly into space.
author: Lucianne Walkowicz
keywords: TED, talks, TED Fellows, TEDx, environment, global issues, science, space, NASA, pollution, Planets, activism, technology, universe
